description: Represents a 'wiki_commit' secret scanning location type. This location type shows that a secret was detected inside a commit to a repository wiki.

path.description: The file path of the wiki page

start_line.description: Line number at which the secret starts in the file

end_line.description: Line number at which the secret ends in the file

start_column.description: The column at which the secret starts within the start line when the file is interpreted as 8-bit ASCII.

end_column.description: The column at which the secret ends within the end line when the file is interpreted as 8-bit ASCII.

blob_sha.description: SHA-1 hash ID of the associated blob

page_url.description: The GitHub URL to get the associated wiki page

commit_sha.description: SHA-1 hash ID of the associated commit

commit_url.description: The GitHub URL to get the associated wiki commit
